title: Additive engineering strategies for improved interfacial stability in lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7772-7781
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02479F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kun Ryu, Kyungbin Lee, Jeonghoon Lim, Michael J. Lee, Keun-Hee Kim, Un Hwan Lee, Bernardine L. D. Rinkel, Kyungmo Kim, Soohyun Kim, Dayoung Kim, Dongsek Shin, Bryan McCloskey, Joonhee Kang, Seung Woo Lee
Additive engineering in low-concentration ether electrolytes enhances the electrode–electrolyte interfacial stability, enabling the stable cycling of high-energy, cost-effective lithium metal batteries.
